plain: Based on the user's favourite movies, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is action. The movies are mostly set in modern times, with a few exceptions such as Jurassic Park and Ghosts of the Abyss. The visual style of the movies is mostly realistic, with the exception of the fantasy elements in Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace. The writing style is mostly dialogue-driven, with the exception of the more plot-driven movies such as Saving Private Ryan and Final Destination 2. The runtime of the movies is mostly between 90 minutes and 2 hours. The themes of the movies are mostly related to action, adventure, and science fiction. The mood of the musical score is mostly intense and action-packed, with the exception of the more emotional scores in movies such as American Beauty and Being John Malkovich. The kind of plot is mostly related to action and adventure, with the exception of the more character-driven movies such as American Beauty and Fight Club. The kind of musical score is mostly related to action and adventure, with the exception of the more emotional scores in movies such as American Beauty and Being John Malkovich. The setting is mostly related to modern times, with the exception of the fantasy elements in Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace. The visual style is mostly realistic, with the exception of the fantasy elements in Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace. The writing style is mostly dialogue-driven, with the exception of the more plot-driven movies such as Saving Private Ryan and Final Destination 2. The runtime is mostly between 90 minutes and 2 hours. The themes are mostly related to action, adventure, and science fiction.
